p: The effect of miracle fruit ( Synsepalum dulcificum) on insulin resistance induced by fructose-rich chow in male Wistar rats was evaluated by Chen et al. ( Chen et al., 2006). Treatment of insulin-resistant animals with 0.02, 0.04 and 0.2 mg/kg extract of miracle fruit ameliorated the effect of fructose-rich chow on glucose-insulin index and the time interval for response to tolbutamide (10.0 mg/kg, i.p.). There was also a significant increase in insulin sensitivity as a result of treatment with miracle fruit powder.
